text: "The Window" may refer to: * The Window (song cycle), an 1871 song cycle by Arthur Sullivan and Alfred, Lord Tennyson * The Window (1949 film), a 1949 American film * The Window (1970 film), a 1970 Iranian film * The Window (album), a 1988 album by saxophonist Steve Lacy * "The Window" (How I Met Your Mother), a 2009 episode of the American sitcom How I Met Your Mother * The Window (Cécile McLorin Salvant album), 2018 ==See also== * Window (disambiguation)
title: The Window
